body: Wait what the fuck??? This character has tits? And a vagina? What kinda Binto doujin is this??
so many guys with the same profile picture arguging lmfao

@NOT ME it’s better to not spend your breath on people like that. It doesn’t really benefit us and we just waste time and thought on them. We’re also feeding them attention as negative as it may be. Oh and if you ever really do feel the necessity to reply to them, that’s fine I’m just sharing what I think of the matter

Fucking retard

@elastic - I've seen way too many red flags for that kind of stuff. If they haven't drawn it yet, they *will* do it eventually. "Bitch" always implies shit like mmf and gangbangs, so still just as bad
Gayaru? Haha, I feel like that's something a bit different.

@RedReflection
> "the fact that they'd use the word "bitch" to refer to the girl implies they draw NTR a whole ton"
> Goes to search bar
> 'Binto, NTR'
> Zero results
Top notch detective skills, you got there. Where'd you learn 'em from?

@BloodEagle I wasn't referring to this specific doujin, but the fact that they'd use the word  "bitch" to refer to the girl implies they draw NTR a whole ton. I already have NTR and the other shit blacklisted, but I can't blacklist works with "bitch" in the title.
@RedReflection  What? This aint NTR, and you can blacklist NTR/Cheating/mmf/Group.....  I aint a fan of shota, but this is not nearly as bad as most of em.

Really wish that any work titled "bitch" had tag just for it so I can blacklist every submission with it.

Still, all the more reason to blacklist the artist. Bye-bye NTRtrash.
